description: I am a Backend Developer with a passion for crafting efficient, secure, and robust solutions. With extensive experience in cloud-based large-scale systems, I also enjoy the flexibility and innovation that comes with implementing smaller projects.
I thrive on challenges, both in the realm of software development and in life, always seeking opportunities to grow and push boundaries.

services.title: Backend Solutions
services.description: The most robust and secure design made at a professional level.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building fast and responsive web applications.

education.title: Applied Software Engineering (TUS Athlone)
education.description: The software engineering master's program was specifically designed to prepare students for careers at Ericsson. The curriculum covered a wide range of essential topics, including advanced Java development, various database design methodologies, coding patterns, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CICD), as well as instruction in Kubernetes and Docker development. Additionally, the program culminated in a final team project, providing hands-on experience in real-world application development scenarios.

education.title: Certificate of Software Engineering (TUS Athlone)
education.description: I enrolled in the prestigious and highly competitive software engineering program at TUS Athlone. This course, sponsored by LM Ericsson, offered an opportunity for top-performing students to gain entry into the master's program. Throughout the course, I acquired foundational knowledge in software development and, notably, honed my teamwork skills. One of the highlights was collaborating with a team to develop a website, culminating in a presentation to Ericsson management.

education.title: Electronic and Computer Engineering (University of Galway)
education.description: During my time in Galway, I discovered my passion for software development. Although my course wasn't specifically tailored to web development, I delved into programming and became captivated by modules covering distributed systems, real-time programming, and AI and machine learning.

experience.title: Ericsson
experience.description: I am currently employed at Ericsson in Athlone, working in cloud RAN. My role involves developing microservices using Go Lang to enhance performance monitoring and fault management. These microservices are meticulously crafted to comply with stringent security design guidelines and ensure scalability.

experience.title: Retail Solutions
experience.description: Retail Solutions operates as an EPOS (electronic point of sales) development firm. I began my journey with the company as a software technician, responsible for configuring software for customers upon receipt of their EPOS systems. This role encompassed database management and the detection and resolution of hardware and software bugs.
